resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103197</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103197</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202648</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring the 1835 NC Constitutional Convention</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen der NC konstitutionellen Vereinbarung 
1835</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorer la convention 1835 constitutionnelle d'OR</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorando a convenção 1835 constitutional do NC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione della convenzione costituzionale 1835 
di NC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ερευνήσει τη συνταγματική Συνθήκη 1835 NC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorar la convención constitucional 1835 del NC</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Internet scavenger hunt allows students to read the actual proceedings of the 1835 Constitutional Convention while they discover for themselves some of the significant amendments that were made. The activity also sets the foundation for class discussion. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Internet-Reinigerjagd erlaubt 
Kursteilnehmern, die tatsächlichen Verfahren der konstitutionellen 
Vereinbarung 1835 zu lesen, während sie für selbst einige der 
bedeutenden Änderungen entdecken, die gebildet wurden. Die 
Aktivität stellt auch die Grundlage für Kategorie Diskussion ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette chasse à Scavenger d'Internet permet à des 
étudiants de lire les démarches réelles de la convention 1835 
constitutionnelle tandis qu'elles découvrent pour elles-mêmes 
certains des amendements significatifs qui ont été faits. 
L'activité place également la base pour la discussion de 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta caça do SCAVENGER do Internet permite que os 
estudantes leiam as continuações reais da convenção 1835 
constitutional quando descobrirem para se algumas das emendas 
significativas que estiveram feitas. A atividade ajusta também 
a fundação para a discussão da classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo pulitore del Internet cerca 
permette che gli allievi indicino gli atti reali della convenzione 
costituzionale 1835 mentre scoprono per se stesso alcune delle 
correzioni significative che sono state fatte. L'attività 
egualmente regola il fondamento per la discussione del codice 
categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το κυνήγι οδοκαθαριστών Διαδικτύου επιτρέπει 
στους σπουδαστές για να διαβάσει τα πραγματικά πρακτικά της 
συνταγματικής Συνθήκης 1835 ενώ ανακαλύπτουν για τους μερικών 
από τις σημαντικές τροποποιήσεις που έγιναν. Η 
δραστηριότητα θέτει επίσης το ίδρυμα για τη συζήτηση κλάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta caza del limpiador del Internet permite que 
los estudiantes lean los procedimientos reales de la convención 
constitucional 1835 mientras que descubren para sí mismos algunas de 
las enmiendas significativas que fueron hechas. La actividad 
también fija la fundación para la discusión de la clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103197</entry>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
